Descriptions.Text:
Corruption is now permanent and deals {1}% increased damage.

Duration reduced to {2} sec against players.
Using Demonic Circle: Teleport or your Demonic Gateway reduces all damage you take by {1}% for {2} sec.
Drain Life heals for {1}% of the amount drained over {2} sec.
Seed of Corruption's explosion increases the stack count of Agony by {1} on all targets hit.

Inflicts increasing agony on the target, causing up to {1} Shadow damage over {2} sec. Damage starts low and increases over the duration. Refreshing Agony maintains its current damage level.

{FFFFFFFF|Agony damage sometimes generates {3} Soul Shard.}
Your Felguard deals {1}% more damage and takes {2}% less damage.
Your Felguard deals {1}% additional damage. Soul Strike now deals {2}% of its damage to nearby enemies.
Chaos Bolt, Shadowburn, and Incinerate deal {1}% increased damage to targets afflicted by Immolate.

When Chaos Bolt or Rain of Fire consumes a charge of Ritual of Ruin, you summon a Blasphemy for {1} sec.

|T1371266:24|t {ffffffff|Blasphemy}
Summons a Blasphemy from the Twisting Nether, impacting for {2} Fire damage and stunning all enemies in the area for {3} sec.

The Blasphemy will serve you for {4} sec, dealing {5} damage to all nearby enemies every {6} sec and generating {7} Soul Shard Fragment every {8} sec.
Conflagrate reduces the cast time of your next Incinerate, Chaos Bolt, or Soul Fire by {1}%. Maximum {2} charges.

Increases your critical strike chance by {1}%.

Physical attacks against you have a {2}% chance to make your next Incinerate instant cast. This effect can only occur once every {3} sec.
Reduces the target's maximum health by up to {1}% for {2} sec.

Your single target spells have a {1}% chance to curse the ground with a demonic bane, causing all of your single target spells to also strike targets marked with the bane for  {2}% of the damage dealt. Lasts {3} sec.
Magical damage over time effects will strike the target an additional time for {1}% of their damage as Shadow. Lasts {2} sec.
Banishes an enemy Demon, Aberration, or Elemental, preventing any action for {1} sec. Limit {2}. Casting Banish again on the target will cancel the effect.

Tear open a portal to the nether above the target location, from which several Bilescourge will pour out of and crash into the ground over {1} sec, dealing {2} Shadow damage to all enemies within {3} yards.
The chance of receiving a Demonic Core from a Wild Imp is increased by {1}% or {2}% when imploded.
Encircle enemy players with Bonds of Fel. If any affected player leaves the {1} yd radius they explode, dealing {2} Fire damage split amongst all nearby enemies.

Chaos Bolt and Rain of Fire increase the damage of your next {1} Incinerates by {2}%. Shadowburn increases the damage of your next Incinerate by {3}%.

Stacks up to {4} times.

Increases your movement speed by {1}%, but also damages you for {2}% of your maximum health every {3} sec. Movement impairing effects may not reduce you below {4}% of normal movement speed. Lasts until canceled.
Summons {1} ferocious Dreadstalkers to attack the target for {2} sec.
Summon a fel lord to guard the location for {1} sec. Any enemy that comes within {2} yards will suffer {3} Physical damage, and players struck will be stunned for {4} sec.

Summons a demonic Observer to keep a watchful eye over the area for {1} sec.

Anytime an enemy within {2} yards casts a harmful magical spell, the Observer will deal up to {3}% of the target's maximum health in Shadow damage.
Your Dreadstalkers' attacks have a {1}% chance to trigger an additional Dreadbite.
Summons a Casting Circle for {1} sec. While within the casting circle, you are immune to silence and interrupt effects.
Calls forth a cataclysm at the target location, dealing {1} Shadowflame damage to all enemies within {2} yards and afflicting them with Immolate.
Launches {1} bolts of felfire over {2} sec at random targets afflicted by your Immolate within {3} yds. Each bolt deals {4} Fire damage to the target and {5} Fire damage to nearby enemies.
Unleashes a devastating blast of chaos, dealing a critical strike for {1} Chaos damage. Damage is further increased by your critical strike chance.
Chaos Bolt, Rain of Fire, and Shadowburn always gains maximum benefit from your Mastery: Chaotic Energies.
Conflagrate and Shadowburn have a {1}% chance to guarantee your next cast of the ability to critically strike, and increase its damage by your critical strike chance.
Corrupts the target, causing {1} Shadow damage over {2} sec.
Summon Infernal reduces the Soul Shard cost of your next {1} casts of Chaos Bolt, Shadowburn, or Rain of Fire by {2}.
Creates a Healthstone that can be consumed to restore {1}% health.
Creates a Soulwell for {1} min. Party and raid members can use the Soulwell to acquire a Healthstone.
Your Agony, Corruption, Siphon Life, and Unstable Affliction deal damage {1}% faster.
Conflagrate deals up to an additional {1}% of the target's maximum health in Fire damage if the target is affected by your Immolate.
When Chaos Bolt damages a target afflicted by Havoc, it explodes, dealing {1} damage to enemies within {2} yards.

Reduces the target's movement speed by {1}% for {2} sec.

{FF8282FF|Curses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.}

Forces the target to speak in Demonic, increasing the casting time of all spells by {1}% for {2} sec.

{FF8282FF|Curses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.}

Increases the time between an enemy's attacks by {1}% for {2} min.

{FF8282FF|Curses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.}

Grants access to the following abilities:

|T136140:24|t{ffffffff|Curse of Tongues}:
Forces the target to speak in Demonic, increasing the casting time of all spells by {1}% for {2} sec.

{FF8282FF|Curses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.}

|T136162:24|t{ffffffff|Curse of Exhaustion}:
Reduces the target's movement speed by {3}% for {4} sec.

{FF8282FF|Curses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.}
Reduces the cooldown of Unending Resolve by {1} sec.
Each target affected by Soul Rot increases your haste and critical strike chance by {1}% for {2} sec.
Sacrifices {1}% of your current health to shield you for {2}% of the sacrificed health plus an additional {3} for {4} sec. Usable while suffering from control impairing effects.
Shadow Bolt and Drain Soul deal an additional {1}% damage.
Reduces the cooldown of Shadowfury by {1} sec and increases its radius by {2} yards.

Launches a bolt of death at the target, accumulating {1}% of the remaining damage from your spells on the target and dealing it over {2} sec.

Counts up to {3} sec of your Corruption's damage.
Your Incinerate and Conflagrate casts on targets that have {1}% or less health reduce the cooldown of Soulfire by {2} sec.
Your Soul Leech absorption now passively recharges at a rate of {1}% of maximum health every {2} sec, and may now absorb up to {3}% of maximum health.

Send the fiery soul of a fallen demon at the enemy, causing {1} Shadowflame damage.

{FFFFFFFF|Generates {2} Soul Shards.}
Shadow Bolt and Demonbolt have a {1}% chance to make your next Call Dreadstalkers cost {2} fewer Soul Shards and have no cast time.
Summons a Demonic Circle for {1} min. Cast Demonic Circle: Teleport to teleport to its location and remove all movement slowing effects.

Summons a Demonic Circle for {1} min. Cast Demonic Circle: Teleport to teleport to its location and remove all movement slowing effects.

You also learn:

|T237560:24|t {ffffffff|Demonic Circle: Teleport}
Teleports you to your Demonic Circle and removes all movement slowing effects.
Teleports you to your Demonic Circle and removes all movement slowing effects.

When your Wild Imps expend all of their energy or are imploded, you have a {1}% chance to absorb their life essence, granting you a stack of Demonic Core. 

When your summoned Dreadstalkers fade away, you have a {2}% chance to absorb their life essence, granting you a stack of Demonic Core.

Demonic Core reduces the cast time of Demonbolt by {3}%. Maximum {4} stacks.
Stamina increased by {1}%.
Increases you and your pets' maximum health by {1}%.
Creates a demonic gateway between two locations. Activating the gateway transports the user to the other gateway. Each player can use a Demonic Gateway only once per {1} min.
Increases the attack speed of your primary pet by {1}%.

Increases the attack speed of your primary pet by {1}%. 

Increases Grimoire of Sacrifice damage by {2}%.
Hand of Gul'dan has a {1}% chance to generate a charge of Demonic Core.
Hand of Gul'dan deals {1}% additional damage and has a {2}% chance per Soul Shard spent of refunding a Soul Shard.
Reduces the chance you will be critically struck by {1}%. All damage your primary demon takes is reduced by {2}%.
Infuse your Felguard with demonic strength and command it to charge your target and unleash a Felstorm that will deal {1}% increased damage.
Incinerate now generates {1}% additional Soul Shard Fragments.

Inflicts impending doom upon the target, causing {1} Shadow damage after {2} sec.

{FFFFFFFF|Doom damage generates {3} Soul Shard.}
If Corruption damages a target affected by your Unstable Affliction, it has a {1}% chance per stack of Malefic Affliction to deal {2} Shadow damage to nearby enemies.
Drains life from the target, causing {1} Shadow damage over {2} sec, and healing you for {3}% of the damage done.
Each Soul Shard spent on Hand of Gul'dan increases the damage of your next Call Dreadstalkers by {1}%.
If Malefic Affliction exceeds {1} stacks, the target instead takes {2}% additional damage from your damage over time effects for {3} sec.
When your Dreadstalkers charge into battle, their Dreadbite attack now hits all targets within {1} yards and deals {2}% more damage.
Chaos Bolt and Shadowburn increases the damage you deal to the target by {1}% for {2} sec.
Whenever you heal yourself with Drain Life, the enemy target deals {1}% reduced damage to you for {2} sec. Stacks up to {3} times.
Reduces the cooldown of Conflagrate by {1} sec.
Summons an Eye of Kilrogg and binds your vision to it. The eye is stealthed and moves quickly but is very fragile.
Strikes fear in the enemy, disorienting for {1} sec. Damage may cancel the effect. Limit {2}.
Felstorm and Dreadbite deal {1}% additional damage.

When Soul Leech absorbs damage, {1}% of damage taken is absorbed and spread out over {2} sec.

Reduces damage taken by {3}%.
Shadow Bolt increases the damage of your Demonbolt by {1}%, stacking up to {2} times. Lasts {3} sec.
Your next Imp, Voidwalker, Incubus, Succubus, Felhunter, or Felguard Summon spell is free and has its casting time reduced by {1} sec.
Chaos Bolt creates a {1} yd wide eruption of Felfire under the target, reducing movement speed by {2}% and reducing all healing received by {3}% on all enemies within the fissure. Lasts {4} sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Felstorm by {1} sec.
Summon a Fel Obelisk with {1}% of your maximum health. Empowers you and your minions within {2} yds, increasing attack speed by {3}% and reducing the cast time of spells by {4}% for {5} sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Fel Domination by {1} sec.
Each time Felstorm deals damage, it increases the damage the target takes from you and your pets by {1}% for {2} sec, up to {3}%.
Soul Leech also heals you for {1}% and your pet for {2}% of the absorption it grants.
Reduces the damage dealt by Burning Rush by {1}%. Burning Rush increases your movement speed by an additional {2}%.
Incinerate now also hits all enemies near your target for {1}% damage.

When your Immolate deals periodic damage to a target above {1}% health, gain {2}% Haste for {3} sec.

Stacks up to {4} times.
Malefic Rapture deals {1}% increased damage to targets suffering from Unstable Affliction.
Reduces the cooldown of Dark Pact by {1} sec.
Dreadbite causes the target to take {1}% additional Shadowflame damage from you for the next {2} sec.
Increases the range of your Demonic Gateway by {1} yards, and reduces the cast time by {2}%.  Reduces the time between how often players can take your Demonic Gateway by {3} sec.
Every Soul Shard you spend reduces the cooldown of Summon Demonic Tyrant by {1} sec.
Every Soul Shard you spend reduces the cooldown of Summon Darkglare by {1} sec.
Every Soul Shard you spend reduces the cooldown of Summon Infernal by {1} sec.
Drain Life now channels {1}% faster and restores health {2}% faster.
When Darkglare deals damage, it deals {1}% of that damage to all enemies affected by your damage over time effects.

Sacrifices your demon pet for power, gaining its command demon ability, and causing your spells to sometimes also deal {1} additional Shadow damage.

Lasts {2} min or until you summon a demon pet.
Damage done by you or your demon has a chance to grant the other one {1}% increased damage for {2} sec.

Summons a Felguard who attacks the target for {1} sec that deals {2}% increased damage.

This Felguard will stun their target when summoned.

Your Felguard hurls his axe towards the target location, erupting when it lands and dealing {1} Shadowflame damage every {2} sec for {3} sec to nearby enemies.

While unarmed, your Felguard's basic attacks deal damage to all nearby enemies and attacks {4}% faster.
When Nether Portal ends, you summon a Pit Lord that gains power based on how many demons you summoned, up to {1} demons, while Nether Portal was active. The Pit Lord lasts for {2} sec.

Calls down a demonic meteor full of Wild Imps which burst forth to attack the target.

Deals up to {1} Shadowflame damage on impact to all enemies within {2} yds of the target and summons up to {3} Wild Imps, based on Soul Shards consumed.

A ghostly soul haunts the target, dealing {1} Shadow damage and increasing your damage dealt to the target by {2}% for {3} sec.

If the target dies, Haunt's cooldown is reset.
Your Haunt spell also increases the damage of your damage over time effects to all targets by {1}% while active.
Marks a target with Havoc for {1} sec, causing your single target spells to also strike the Havoc victim for {2}% of the damage dealt.
Sacrifices {1}% of your maximum health to heal your summoned Demon for twice as much over {2} sec.
Your Fear causes the target to tremble in place instead of fleeing in fear.
Let loose a terrifying howl, causing {1} enemies within {2} yds to flee in fear, disorienting them for {3} sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Dark Pact sacrifices only {1}% of your current health for the same shield value.

Burns the enemy, causing {1} Fire damage immediately and an additional {2} Fire damage over {3} sec.

{FFFFFFFF|Periodic damage generates {4} Soul Shard Fragment and has a {5}% chance to generate an additional {6} on critical strikes.}

When your primary Felguard's Legion Strike damages only {1} target, its damage is increased by {2}%.
 
Your primary Felguard deals {3} Physical damage after auto-attacking the same enemy {4} consecutive times.

Summoning a Wild Imp has a {1}% chance to summon a Imp Gang Boss instead. An Imp Gang Boss deals {2}% additional damage. 

When imploded, an Imp Gang Boss will summon a Wild Imp.
Demonic forces suck all of your Wild Imps toward the target, and then cause them to violently explode, dealing {1} Shadowflame damage to all enemies within {2} yards.
Conflagrate gains an additional charge.
Increases the duration of Immolate by {1} sec.

Draws fire toward the enemy, dealing {1} Fire damage.

{FFFFFFFF|Generates {2} Soul Shard Fragments and an additional {3} on critical strikes.}
Damaging an enemy with Agony increases the damage dealt by your next Drain Life by {1}%. This effect stacks up to {2} times.
Your Infernal's melee attacks cause its target to take {1}% increased damage from its Immolation, stacking up to {2} times.
While your Felguard is active, your Wild Imps and Dreadstalkers deal {1}% additional damage.
Rain of Fire damage is increased by {1}% and has a {2}% chance to generate a Soul Shard Fragment.
You passively summon a Wild Imp to fight for you every {1} sec. While in combat, you also have a {2}% chance to summon an additional Demon to fight for you for {3} sec.
Your spells and abilities have a chance to summon an Inquisitor's Eye that deals {1} Shadowflame damage every {2} sec for {3} sec.
Chaos Bolt consumes up to {1} sec of Immolate's damage over time effect on your target, instantly dealing that much damage.
Doom deals {1}% increased damage for each demon pet you have active.
Malefic Rapture and Seed of Corruption deal an additional {1}% damage.
When you use a Healthstone, gain {1}% Leech for {2} sec.

Chaos Bolt increases the damage of Chaos Bolt by {1}% and reduces the cast time of Chaos Bolt by {2}% for {3} sec.

Rain of Fire increases the damage of Rain of Fire by {4}% for {5} sec.

Shadowburn increases the damage of Shadowburn by {6}% for {7} sec.
Malefic Rapture causes your active Unstable Affliction to deal {1}% additional damage, up to {2}%, for the rest of its duration.
Your damaging periodic effects erupt on all targets, causing {1} Shadow damage per effect.
Darkglare increases its damage by an additional {1}% for each damage over time effect active. Darkglare lasts an additional {2} sec.
Ritual of Ruin requires {1} less Soul Shards spent.
Your Call Dreadstalkers is now instant cast.
Your spells deal {1}% increased damage, plus a random amount of up to {2}% additional increased damage.
Increases the damage done by your demons by {1}%.
Increases damage done by Malefic Rapture, Agony, Corruption, Phantom Singularity, Unstable Affliction, and Seed of Corruption by {1}%.
Horrifies an enemy target into fleeing, incapacitating for {1} sec and healing you for {2}% of maximum health.
When Nether Portal summons a demon, it has a {1}% chance to summon an additional demon.
Tear open a portal to the Twisting Nether for {1} sec. Every time you spend Soul Shards, you will also command demons from the Nether to come out and fight for you.
Surrounds the caster with a shield that lasts {1} sec, reflecting all harmful spells cast on you.

Corruption damage has a chance to cause your next Shadow Bolt or Drain Soul to deal {1}% increased damage. 

Shadow Bolt is instant cast and Drain Soul channels {2}% faster when affected.
When Fear ends, the target is slowed by {1}% for {2} sec.
Hand of Gul'dan has a {1}% chance to cast a second time on your target for free.
Refreshing Corruption, Agony, Unstable Affliction, or Siphon Life with less than {1} seconds remaining will deal {2} Shadow damage and has a {3}% chance to grant you a Soul Shard.

Increases the base duration of Havoc by {1} sec.

Mayhem has an additional {2}% chance to trigger.
Places a phantom singularity above the target, which consumes the life of all enemies within {1} yards, dealing {2} damage over {3} sec, healing you for {4}% of the damage done.
While your Succubus is active, your Shadow damage is increased by {1}% and the cast time of your Shadow Bolt is reduced by {2} sec.
Consuming Soul Shards increases your Mastery by {1}% for {2} sec for each shard spent. Gaining a stack does not refresh the duration.
Instantly sacrifice up to {1} Wild Imps, generating {2} charges of Demonic Core that cause Demonbolt to deal {3}% additional damage.
If an interrupt is used on you while you are not casting, gain {1}% Haste and become immune to crowd control, interrupt, and cast pushback effects for {2} sec.
When your health drops below {1}%, the percentage of damage shared via your Soul Link is increased by an additional {2}%.

When your health drops below {1}%, the percentage of damage shared via your Soul Link is increased by an additional {2}%. 

While Grimoire of Sacrifice is active, your Stamina is increased by {3}%.
Enemies affected by your Rain of Fire take {1}% increased damage from your Fire spells.
Channel Demonfire fires an additional {1} bolts. Each bolt increases the remaining duration of Immolate on all targets hit by {2} sec.
While your initial Infernal is active, every Soul Shard you spend has a {1}% chance to summon an additional Infernal that lasts {2} sec.

Calls down a rain of hellfire, dealing {1} Fire damage over {2} sec to enemies in the area.

Rain of Fire has a {3}% chance to generate a Soul Shard Fragment.
Unstable Affliction can now be applied to up to {1} targets.
For the next {1} sec, all of your damage over time effects occur {2}% more often.

Demonic Tyrant deals {1}% additional damage.

Active Wild Imps grant {2} stack of Demonic Servitude. Active greater demons grant {3} stacks of Demonic Servitude.

Demonic Tyrant deals {4}% additional damage for each stack of Demonic Servitude active at the time of his summon.
Attacks received that deal at least {1}% of your health decrease Unending Resolve's cooldown by {2} sec. Cannot occur more than once every {3} sec.
Your spells have a chance to grant you {1}% Haste for {2} sec.
Call Dreadstalkers has a {1}% chance to summon an additional Dreadstalker.
Begins a ritual that sacrifices a random participant to summon a doomguard. Requires the caster and {1} additional party members to complete the ritual.
Every {1} Soul Shards spent grants Ritual of Ruin, making your next Chaos Bolt or Rain of Fire consume no Soul Shards and have its cast time reduced by {2}%.
Begins a ritual to create a summoning portal, requiring the caster and {1} allies to complete. This portal can be used to summon party and raid members.
Conflagrate increases your Immolate, Incinerate, and Conflagrate damage to the target by {1}% for {2} sec.
Each time your spells duplicate from Havoc, gain {1}% increased damage for {2} sec. Stacks up to {3} times.
Each time your Drain Life deals damage, it increases the duration of your Unstable Affliction, Corruption and Agony on the target by {1} sec.
Increases the damage of Conflagrate, Channel Demonfire, Shadowburn, and Soulfire by {1}%.
Shadow Bolt and Demonbolt deal {1}% additional damage per demon you have summoned.
Corruption damage is increased by {1}%, and each time it deals damage any of your Curses active on the target are extended by {2} sec.
Shadow Bolt damage increased by {1}%.
Incinerate damage increased by {1}%.
Shadow Bolt and Drain Soul damage increased by {1}%.
Increases the damage of Immolate by {1}%.

Embeds a demon seed in the enemy target that will explode after {1} sec, dealing {2} Shadow damage to all enemies within {3} yards and applying Corruption to them.

The seed will detonate early if the target is hit by other detonations, or takes {4} damage from your spells.
Haunt deals {1}% additional damage. When the Haunt spell ends or is dispelled, the soul returns to you, healing for {2}% of the damage it did to the target.

Sends a shadowy bolt at the enemy, causing {1} Shadow damage.

{FFFFFFFF|Generates {2} Soul Shard.}
Shadow Bolt and Drain Soul apply Shadow Embrace, increasing your damage dealt to the target by {1}% for {2} sec. Stacks up to {3} times.

Conjure a Shadow Rift at the target location lasting {1} sec. Enemy players within the rift when it expires are teleported to your Demonic Circle.

Must be within {2} yds of your Demonic Circle to cast.
When your summoned Dreadstalkers fade away, they increase the damage of your Demonbolt by {1}% for {2} sec.

Blasts a target for {1} Shadowflame damage, gaining {2}% critical strike chance on targets that have {3}% or less health.

{FFFFFFFF|Restores {4} Soul Shard and refunds a charge if the target dies within {5} sec.}
Slows enemies in a {1} yard cone in front of you by {2}% for {3} sec.
Stuns all enemies within {1} yds for {2} sec.
Siphons the target's life essence, dealing {1} Shadow damage over {2} sec and healing you for {3}% of the damage done.
Wild Imp damage increased by {1}%.
Agony damage increased by {1}%.
Immolate damage increased by {1}%.
Every Soul Shard you spend has a {1}% chance to be refunded.

Burns the enemy's soul, dealing {1} Fire damage and applying Immolate.

{FFFFFFFF|Generates {2} Soul Shard.}
When you kill a target, its soul bursts into flames, dealing {1} Shadowflame damage to nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond {2} targets.
All single-target damage done by you and your minions grants you and your pet shadowy shields that absorb {1}% of the damage dealt, up to {2}% of maximum health.
{1}% of all damage you take is taken by your demon pet instead.

{1}% of all damage you take is taken by your demon pet instead. 

While Grimoire of Sacrifice is active, your Stamina is increased by {2}%.

Wither away all life force of your current target and up to {1} additional targets nearby, causing your primary target to suffer {2} Nature damage and secondary targets to suffer {3} Nature damage over {4} sec.

For the next {5} sec, casting Drain Life will cause you to also Drain Life from any enemy affected by your Soul Rot, and Drain Life will not consume any mana.

Soul Shards are generated by your Shadow Bolt.

Soul Shards are consumed to cast your most powerful spells and summon demons to serve you.

While out of combat you regenerate up to {1} Soul Shards.

Soul Shard Fragments are generated by many of your spells.

Soul Shards are consumed to cast your most powerful spells and summon demons to serve you.

While out of combat you regenerate up to {1} Soul Shards.

Soul Shards are generated by your Agony's damage over time.

Soul Shards are consumed to cast your most powerful spells and summon demons to serve you.

While out of combat you regenerate up to {1} Soul Shards.

Command your Felguard to strike into the soul of its enemy, dealing {1} Shadow damage.

{FFFFFFFF|Generates {2} Soul Shard.}

Copies your damage over time effects from the target, preserving their duration.

Your next use of Soul Swap within {1} sec will exhale a copy damage of the effects onto a new target.
Whenever Unstable Affliction deals damage, the cooldown of Soul Rot is reduced by {1} sec.
Summoning your Demonic Tyrant instantly generates {1} Soul Shards.

Consumes a Soul Shard, unlocking the hidden power of your spells.

{FFFFFFFF|Demonic Circle: Teleport}: Increases your movement speed by {1}% and makes you immune to snares and roots for {2} sec.

{FFFFFFFF|Demonic Gateway}: Can be cast instantly.

{FFFFFFFF|Drain Life}: Gain an absorb shield equal to the amount of healing done for {3} sec. This shield cannot exceed {4}% of your maximum health.

{FFFFFFFF|Health Funnel}: Restores {5}% more health and reduces the damage taken by your pet by {6}% for {7} sec.

{FFFFFFFF|Healthstone}: Increases the healing of your Healthstone by {8}% and increases your maximum health by {9}% for {10} sec.
Stores the soul of the target party or raid member, allowing resurrection upon death. Also castable to resurrect a dead target. Targets resurrect with {1}% health and at least {2}% mana.
Seed of Corruption now embeds demon seeds into {1} additional nearby enemies.

When your Wild Imps cast Fel Firebolt, you gain an application of Stolen Power. After you reach {1} applications, your next Demonbolt deals {2}% increased damage or your next Shadow Bolt deals {3}% increased damage.
Unending Resolve reduces damage taken by an additional {1}%.
Subjugates the target demon up to level {1}, forcing it to do your bidding for {2} min.

Summons a Darkglare from the Twisting Nether that extends the duration of your damage over time effects on all enemies by {1} sec.

The Darkglare will serve you for {2} sec, blasting its target for {3} Shadow damage, increased by {4}% for every damage over time effect you have active on their current target.
Summon a Demonic Tyrant to increase the duration of all of your current lesser demons by {1} sec, and increase the damage of all of your other demons by {2}%, while damaging your target.
Summons a Felguard under your command as a powerful melee combatant.
Summons a Felhunter under your command, able to disrupt the spell casts of your enemies.
Summons an Imp under your command that casts ranged Firebolts.

Summons an Infernal from the Twisting Nether, impacting for {1} Fire damage and stunning all enemies in the area for {2} sec.

The Infernal will serve you for {3} sec, dealing {4} damage to all nearby enemies every {5} sec and generating {6} Soul Shard Fragment every {7} sec.
Summons a Succubus or Incubus under your command to seduce enemy Humanoids, preventing them from attacking.

Summons a Soulkeeper that consumes all Tormented Souls you've collected, blasting nearby enemies for {1} Chaos damage per soul consumed over {2} sec. Deals reduced damage beyond {3} targets and only one Soulkeeper can be active at a time.

You collect Tormented Souls from each target you kill and occasionally escaped souls you previously collected.
Summon a Vilefiend to fight for you for the next {1} sec.
Summons a Voidwalker under your command, able to withstand heavy punishment.
Your Healthstone heals you for an additional {1}% of your maximum health. Any party or raid member using a Healthstone also heals you for that amount.

Your primary pets gain a bonus effect.

{FFFFFFFF|Imp}: Successful Singe Magic casts grant the target {1}% damage reduction for {2} sec.

{FFFFFFFF|Voidwalker}: Reduces the cooldown of Shadow Bulwark by {3} sec.

{FFFFFFFF|Felhunter}: Reduces the cooldown of Devour Magic by {4} sec.

{FFFFFFFF|Sayaad}: Reduces the cooldown of Seduction by {5} sec and causes the target to walk faster towards the demon.

{FFFFFFFF|Felguard}: Reduces the cooldown of Pursuit by {6} sec and increases its maximum range by {7} yards.

Your primary pets gain a bonus effect.
